Summary: saw round pulsating object glowing like coals in a burn pit .as i watched it faded out.
trends: There have been no other sightings in East Syracuse
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was the day after memorial day.i was walking to work i walked under a over pass when i came out the other side.some reason i looked to my right and up about 45 degrees.i saw a round object glowing like coals in a fire.ive walk this route on a daily basis never once seeing anything like this.i started walking backwords watching this object.it kept glowing bright then it would die down then it would do it over again.about 15 minutes or so i watched it get very bright then it went out.as if someone just turned a light switch off.the feelings i had were am i really seeing what im seeing .more or less in awe.i felt like i had goose bumps over my entire body.
